item.title: Research
item.description: 2020 Ruixiang Cui. Refining and Parsing Implicit Argument in Universal Conceptual Cognitive Annotation. Master’s thesis. Ruixiang Cui, Daniel Hershcovich. Refining Implicit Argument Annotation for UCCA. In Proceedings of the Second International Workshop on Designing Meaning Representations (DMR) at the 28th International Conference on Computational Linguistics (COLING). Ofir Arviv, Ruixiang Cui, Daniel Hershcovich. 2020. HUJI-KU at MRP 2020: Two Transition-based Neural Parser. In Proceedings of the Shared Task on Cross-Framework Meaning Representation Parsing at the 2020 Conference on Computational Natural Language Learning (CoNLL).
